## Loading all required packages 
The analysis requires the following packages. 
```{r setup,echo=TRUE, message = FALSE, eval=FALSE}
library(DCATS)
library(vroom)
library(splatter)
library(scater)
library(Seurat)
library(stringr)
library(compositions)
library(dplyr)
library(MCMCpack)
```

## Loading the data set
We use vroom to load the large gene-cell count matrix which is the starting point of our analysis. 
```{r import, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
primary_data <- vroom("TIP_ShamVsMI_days3_7.txt")
bigM <- as.data.frame(primary_data)
```

## Treat Seurat to the data and return seurat object 
The following step makes use treatbySeurat in DCATS to return the normalised and filtered matrix, and the associated Seurat object:
```{r treat_seurat, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
bigM <- treatbySeurat(bigM)
```
